int main()
{
 char *c[] = {"ENTER","NEW","POINT","FIRST"};
 char**cp[] = {c+3,c+2,c+1,c};
 char***cpp = cp;
 printf("%s\n", **++cpp);
 printf("%s\n", *--*++cpp+3);
 printf("%s\n", *cpp[-2]+3);
 printf("%s\n", cpp[-1][-1]+1);

}
